aws:region.description: The AWS region to deploy into

rdsDbIdentifier.description: The DB Identifier of the RDS cluster for which rotating secrets are being configured.

rotatedSecretsEnvironmentName.description: Name of the environment that will rotate the DB credentials. Format of the name needs to be `myProject/myEnvironment`.

managingCredsEnvironmentName.description: (Optional) Name of the environment that will contain the privileged managing user credentials used to rotate the user DB credentials. Otherwise the name will be derived from the rotated secrets environment name.

backendUrl.description: (Optional) The Pulumi Cloud URL. Change this URL ONLY if you are self-hosting Pulumi Cloud.
